articles.description: Salford eased into the playoff semi-finals with a 28-0 win at Huddersfield, thanks to tries from Ryan Brierley, Kallum Watkins, Joe Burgess and Andy Ackers
articles.content: Super League is no stranger to an underdog story, but this is some chapter of history Salford are threatening to write. To call this squad assembled by Paul Rowley a bunch of misfits would perhaps be… [+3138 chars]

articles.author: Tom Blow
articles.title: Barcelona will resume Bernardo Silva pursuit 'ASAP' despite summer transfer snub - The Mirror
articles.description: Barcelona wanted to sign four-time Premier League winner Bernardo Silva from Manchester City in the summer window but failed to agree a deal for the Portuguese ace
articles.content:
Barcelona will continue their pursuit of Bernardo Silva in January after La Liga increased their salary cap by 560million (£490m). 
 The Spanish giants tried to sign Silva, 28, in the summer but fai… [+2850 chars]
